data.actual_result: You get scrolled up in chat a little every time you change your client language
data.expected_result: Your current scrolled position is kept in place
data.short_description: Changing your client language scrolls you up in the chat you're currently viewing
data.steps_to_repro: - Be using any Chat Font Scaling besides default (100) - Go into a channel with enough messages to scroll up in - Go into your User Settings > Language - Switch to another language then exit your User Settings and observe your scrolled position compared to before (Note: This may take 2-3 tries, it doesn't always occur for some reason, but switching between two languages a few times should show results as the scroll effect stacks)
